mapper.insert: insert into payment values ((select nvl(max(payment_id),0)+1 from payment),#{contents_no},#{user_no},sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set cash=cash-((select viewcontent_price from content where contents_no=#{contents_no})) where (select cash from member where user_no=#{user_no}) >= (select viewcontent_price from content where contents_no=#{contents_no}) and user_no=#{user_no}
